1.content: This is what the character will say
1.speed: This is the speed with which the line should be read, can be very slow, slow, medium or fast
1.sound: Path to the sound the speaker will make. Defaults when left blank

2.1: This is the content of the first choice
2.skip1: This is where the dialogue should go if choice 1 is selected
2.2: This is the content of the second choice
2.skip2: This is where the dialogue should go if choice 2 is selected

3.flag: this is the name of the flag that should be updated. Value is the value that flag will assume

4.flag: this is the name of the flag that will be checked
4.skip_if_true: this is where the dialogue should go if the flag is true
4.skip_if_false: this is where the dialogue should go it the flag is false

5.skip_to: this is where the dialogue should skip to. You can skip to -1 to end the dialogue

6.speaker: this is the speaker that the dialogue should transfer to. self refers to the node speaking, player refers to the player. Use path otherwise
